access_error: Access error to the system. Please, try again.
activity_not_started: This activity has not started yet. Please wait for the start!
activity_does_not_have_visitors_gift: Activity does not have gifts enabled.
activity_not_active: This activity is inactive at the moment.
activity_inactive: This activity is inactive at the moment.
deliver_error: An error occurred while delivering the gift. Please try again.
gift_already_delivered: Error: the gift has already been delivered previously.
unauthorized: Authentication failure. Please log in again.
check_error: Error during the check. Please try again.
